comment: Smart Data Models - Pss2B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/Pss2B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE PSS2B Model.  Extra lead/lag (or rate) block added at end (up to 4 lead/lags total).

contents.name: a
contents.comment: Numerator constant (a).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: inputSignal1Type
contents.comment: Type of input signal #1.  Typical Value = rotorSpeed. Default: None

contents.name: inputSignal2Type
contents.comment: Type of input signal #2.  Typical Value = generatorElectricalPower. Default: None

contents.name: ks1
contents.comment: Stabilizer gain (Ks1).  Typical Value = 12. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks2
contents.comment: Gain on signal #2 (Ks2).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks3
contents.comment: Gain on signal #2 input before ramp-tracking filter (Ks3).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ks4
contents.comment: Gain on signal #2 input after ramp-tracking filter (Ks4).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: m
contents.comment: Denominator order of ramp tracking filter (M).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

contents.name: n
contents.comment: Order of ramp tracking filter (N).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0.12. Default: 0

contents.name: t10
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T10).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t11
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T11).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

contents.name: t4
contents.comment: Lead/lag time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: t6
contents.comment: Time constant on signal #1 (T6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t7
contents.comment: Time constant on signal #2 (T7).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

contents.name: t8
contents.comment: Lead of ramp tracking filter (T8).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

contents.name: t9
contents.comment: Lag of ramp tracking filter (T9).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Lead constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Lag time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tw1
contents.comment: First washout on signal #1 (Tw1).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

contents.name: tw2
contents.comment: Second washout on signal #1 (Tw2).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

contents.name: tw3
contents.comment: First washout on signal #2 (Tw3).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

contents.name: tw4
contents.comment: Second washout on signal #2 (Tw4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: vsi1max
contents.comment: Input signal #1 max limit (Vsi1max).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsi1min
contents.comment: Input signal #1 min limit (Vsi1min).  Typical Value = -2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsi2max
contents.comment: Input signal #2 max limit (Vsi2max).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vsi2min
contents.comment: Input signal #2 min limit (Vsi2min).  Typical Value = -2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vstmax
contents.comment: Stabilizer output max limit (Vstmax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vstmin
contents.comment: Stabilizer output min limit (Vstmin).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
